reference: [1] Bacchetta, Philippe and Eric van Wincoop (2006), Incomplete Information Processing: A Solution to the Forward Discount Puzzle, working paper, University of Virginia.

[4] Fama, Eugene F. (1984), Forward and Spot Exchange Rates, Journal of Monetary Economics 14, 319-338.
[5] Meese, Richard A. and Kenneth Rogoff (1983), Empirical Exchange Rate Models of the Seventies: Do They Fit Out of Sample? Journal of International Economics 14, 345-373.
